mapper.select: /* 컨텐츠 정보 */ SELECT c.CONTENTS_NAME AS contentsName, c.CONTENTS_SELL_START_DATE AS contentsSellStartDate, c.CONTENTS_SELL_END_DATE AS contentsSellEndDate, c.CONTENTS_PG AS contentsPg, c.CONTENTS_PRICE AS contentsPrice, cf.FILE_NAME AS fileName FROM CONTENTS AS c INNER JOIN CONTENTS_FILE AS cf ON cf.CONTENTS_ID=c.CONTENTS_ID;
